alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pocahontas; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 09 at 6:55AM EDT until October 09 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30, gradually rising above freezing by mid morning. * WHERE...Northwest Pocahontas, Southeast Pocahontas and Southeast Randolph Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pocahontas; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph
